channel.title: When I logon to my server I see the interface but the playing area is black
channel.description:
This problem has occured just now, it worked before I tried to put a new shop in. The error shows in the run.bat
[code]Starting RevengeScape on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "8 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException java:48) at java.lang.Interger.parseInt(Interger.java:456) at java.lang.Interger.parseInt(Interger.java:497) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:115) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:28) [/code]
